headline: Is GE Vernova (GEV) Still Attractive After 163% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether GE Vernova’s current share price makes sense or feels stretched, this article walks through what the numbers say about value rather than just the headline moves. The stock recently closed at US$830.34, with returns of 3.5% over 7 days, 26.2% over 30 days, 22.2% year to date, and 163.5% over the past year, figures that will catch many investors’ attention. Recent news around GE Vernova has focused on its position as a standalone energy business following the...
